name: Crash Test Destruction
description:
Be a part of crash test drive! Dismount cars with dummy! Smash car destruction is fun! Ragdoll crash test! Car crash test in 3D and first-person view! Be in place of ragdoll in crash test drive is not for the faint of heart! Control the car, fly on nitro towards obstacles! Dismount dummy as hard as it possible! The longer it flies after smash and the more it damaged, the more points you get! Earn points and open new cars in crash test dummy game! This is real mannequine challenge! Save videos of car destruction and share records with friends in social networks!
Warning! Crash Test Destruction it's a simulator, made for fun and entertainment! We are for safety driving!
